p:
We applied Approximate Bayes Factor colocalization (coloc.abf)
7 from the coloc R package to the summary statistics from the PGC2 Schizophrenia GWAS
36 downloaded from the PGC website ( http://pgc.unc.edu), and the summary statistics from the eQTL meta-analysis. Each gene present in the meta-analysis was compared to the GWAS in turn, and suggestive and significant GWAS peaks with p-value < 5e-6 were considered for analysis.
